title: Leta Lestrange's Wand
description: The wand of Leta Lestrange, the only child of Corvus Lestrange and Laurena Kama. A pure blood witch, close school friend of Newt Scamander and the fiancée of Theseus Scamander.Leta Lestrange's wand measures approximately 34 cm in length. This wand is presented in a sleek, collectible wand box featuring the character name with decorative paper overlay. Makes the perfect gift for any aspiring witch or wizard or a great addition to your Harry Potter collectibles.This authentic replica sculpted in resin, is a fragile collectible wand. Not intended for use as a toy.

title: Narcissa Malfoy's Wand
description: Add this high-quality wand replica to your Harry Potter collection with this bespoke Narcissa Malfoy's wand recreation.Sculpted from resin and measuring approximately 34cm long, the unique wand is the perfect gift for any aspiring witch or wizard. The wand is available in a sleek, collectable wand box for you to display anywhere in your home and features the Warner Bros. Studio Tour London - The Making of Harry Potter logo.Wand measures approximately 13 3/4” in length. Please note this wand is a collectable replica, and not a toy.

title: Fred Weasley's Wand
description: Add this high-quality wand replica to your Harry Potter collection with this bespoke Fred Weasley wand recreation.Fred Weasley's wand is sculpted from resin and measures approximately 34cm long. The wand is available in a sleek, collectible wand box for you to display anywhere in your home, making it the perfect gift for any aspiring witch or wizard and a great addition to any Harry Potter fan’s collection.Please note this wand is a collectible replica, and not a toy.

title: Ron Weasley's Wand
description: Add this high-quality wand replica to your Harry Potter collection with this bespoke Fred Weasley wand recreation.Fred Weasley's wand is sculpted from resin and measures approximately 34cm long. The wand is available in a sleek, collectible wand box for you to display anywhere in your home, making it the perfect gift for any aspiring witch or wizard and a great addition to any Harry Potter fan’s collection.Please note this wand is a collectible replica, and not a toy.

title: Herbology Lunch Bag
description: Welcome to Herbology at Hogwarts, where you'll nurture profound ties with enchanted flora and observe their remarkable attributes. Be it the peculiar Mandrakes or the formidable Venomous Tentacula, each leaf and root conceal a narrative waiting to be unravelled!

title: Herbology Water Bottle
description: Greetings, aspiring witches and wizards! You're about to embark on a captivating journey into the enchanting world of Herbology! Participate in this class and uncover the secrets of the Wizarding World's mystical flora. Embrace the magical challenges that await you!

title: Herbology Mug
description: Welcome to the captivating domain of Herbology! Within these enchanting grounds, you'll nurture profound ties with magical flora, observing their extraordinary qualities. Each leaf and root unfold a unique narrative, inviting you into the verdant tales of the Wizarding World!

title: Herbology Notebook
description: Explore the captivating study of Herbology, where you'll nurture profound bonds with enchanted flora and observe their exceptional attributes. Whether it's the peculiar Mandrakes or the formidable Venomous Tentacula, each leaf and root conceal a narrative waiting to be discovered!

title: Personalised Hogwarts Acceptance Letter
description: You can now receive your very own personalised replica of the Hogwarts Acceptance Letter, complete with an exclusive supplies list. Your Hogwarts Acceptance Letter will arrive addressed specifically to the lucky individual, printed in the same shade of green as Harry Potter's own Acceptance Letter, inside an exclusive Hogwarts Presentation Wallet. The letter features the Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry crest and is signed by Professor McGonagall, Professor at Hogwarts and Head of the Gryffindor House. Your Personalised Hogwarts Acceptance Letter contains the below: 1 x Personalised Hogwarts Acceptance Letter. 1 x Personalised Envelope. 1 x Supplies List. 1 x Adhesive Wax Seal. 1 x Presentation Wallet featuring the famous Hogwarts school crest. Please make sure you fill in your name exactly how you would like it to appear on your Hogwarts acceptance letter and envelope. Make sure to enter your full first name on the customisation form. Our Personalised Hogwarts Acceptance Letter is only able to be ordered using characters from the English alphabet. Please include your full first name when filling out your letter details. Please note, unfortunately apostrophes cannot be printed at this time.

title: Herbology Notebook
description: Explore the captivating study of Herbology, where you'll nurture profound bonds with enchanted flora and observe their exceptional attributes. Whether it's the peculiar Mandrakes or the formidable Venomous Tentacula, each leaf and root conceal a narrative waiting to be discovered!

title: Personalised Slytherin Robe
description: Celebrate your Hogwarts house pride with this replica Slytherin robe, as seen in the Harry Potter film series. The Personalised Slytherin Robe features contrasting green lining, pockets (there's even a hidden pocket for your wand!), and embroidered Slytherin crest. All robes include optional, complementary personalisation. To select personalisation, enter your first name up to 13 characters below. Currently, we are only able to offer personalisation in the English alphabet. Please allow an additional 7 working days for personalised items to be dispatched. *Please also note that personalised items will be made especially for you, so they can only be returned if they are faulty, are not as described, or do not meet with your instructions.

title: Personalised Ravenclaw Robe
description: Celebrate your Hogwarts house pride with this replica Personalised Ravenclaw robe, as seen in the Harry Potter film series. The Ravenclaw robe features contrasting blue lining, pockets (there's even a hidden pocket for your wand!), and embroidered Ravenclaw crest. All robes include optional, complimentary personalisation. To select personalisation, enter your first name up to 13 characters below. At this time, we can only offer personalisation in the English alphabet. Not a Ravenclaw? Hogwarts house robes are available for each of the four houses. Sizes are approximate. Individual robes may vary slightly. Please allow an additional 7 working days for personalised items to be dispatched.

title: Butterbeer and Mugs Gift Set
description: Treat yourself or a loved one to a Harry Potter experience with this Butterbeer collector set, featuring two stunning glass steins and a 4-pack of authentic Butterbeer bottles. Each stein showcases exclusive designs by Minalima, the stained glass-inspired artwork offering up an authentic feeling of sitting at a Butterbeer bar. The set also includes four bottles of the iconic, frothy beverage, made with only the finest ingredients and perfect for sharing. Whether you're an avid collector or a fan of the Wizarding World, this set is a must-have. Don't miss the chance to indulge in the magic of this gift set – for a friend, but also for yourself! This Butterbeer and Mugs Gift Set includes: - x2 [Butterbeer Glass](https://harrypottershop.co.uk/products/butterbeer-glass) - [Bottled Butterbeer 4-Pack](https://harrypottershop.co.uk/products/bottled-butterbeer-4-pack)

title: Chocolate Frog with Personalised Wizard Card
description: Create your very own personalised wizard card for the ultimate Harry Potter gifting experience. Great for yourself or as the perfect gift for a treasured keepsake, unique to every Hogwarts student. The beloved and best-selling Chocolate Frog with Personalised Wizard Card will be sure to excite both chocolate lovers and collectors alike. Straight off the Hogwarts Express Sweets Trolley, the most famous wizarding confectionery, the Chocolate Frog, is now available to own with a personalised wizard card, designed by you. Packaged in a classic style violet and gold Honeydukes box, along with a delicious edible replica of the milk Chocolate Frog, this confectionery delight contains a collectable witch or wizard card starring you! This personalised chocolate frog features your chosen photo on the front of a high-quality glossy card, as well as a description of your Hogwarts house, wand core, and a selection of hobbies and favourite Hogwarts classes on the back. Now available to own and collect, along with a randomised wizard card including Professor Minerva McGonagall, Professor Dolores Umbridge, Neville Longbottom and the rarest card of them all, Harry Potter. Which card will you receive? All images shown are for promotional purposes only. Please allow an additional 7 working days for personalised items to be dispatched. Please note, that your Chocolate Frog with Personalised Wizard Card will be sent in a separate package to any other items in your order.
